source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_00<tab>Prairillot needs a favor of you, and the chagrin it causes him is almost payment enough for the job.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_00<tab>アートボルグ砦群の衛兵プレリオーは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_01<tab>As the relentless cold batters Skyfire Locks, Prairillot is vexed to discover that there are no men to spare for firewood duty, and he must avail himself of an adventurer's help. Your task is to gather eight bundles of firewood from the area around Skyfire Locks.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_01<tab>プレリオーは「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>」の補充をしたいようだ。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8CC101 /var>」を探して、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>」を8つ集めよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_02<tab>You have eight bundles of firewood, dry and ready for the stove. They should be delivered to Stephannot on the east hill ere he and his men freeze to death.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>を集めた。アートボルグ砦群の西の高台にいる「ステファノー」に届けよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_03<tab>Stephannot's thanks has a forced ring to it, despite his obvious relief at having more fuel on hand for the killing chill of night. Many in these parts mistrust outlanders and mislike adventurers, a state of things that makes your stay in Coerthas an uneasy one.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_SEQ_03<tab>暖を取らねば死んでしまうというステファノ―。冒険者の働きには感謝をしているようだが、冒険者が外の者である点についてはやはり快く思っていないようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_TODO_00<tab>Gather bundles of firewood from around Skyfire Locks.

target: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_TODO_01<tab>ステファノーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_000<tab>It galls me to ask for the help of an adventurer, yet I cannot leave the fort, not now...damn it!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_000<tab>こんなことで、冒険者に依頼を……。
……しかし、この砦を離れるわけにもいかん。クソ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_001<tab>You are eager to do us service, is that not right, adventurer? There is some urgent need for firewood and you would gain much by assisting us.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_001<tab>冒険者よ、どうせ仕事を探しているのだろう？
ならば「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>」を補充してきてくれ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_002<tab>The area around Skyfire Locks never lacks for firewood. Collect eight bundles and deliver them to Stephannot on the east hill.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_PRAIRILLOT_000_002<tab>その辺りで薪を8束ほど集め、
西の高台にいる「ステファノー」に渡してほしいのだ。
薪となる木は、雪に埋もれた木の辺りに落ちているはずだ。
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_DUMMY_000_010<tab>「雪に埋もれた木」にアクセスし、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>」を拾う(8つ)

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_020<tab>Took your time, you sniveling whey-face! ...Firewood? Who told you to bring firewood, whelp!? What happened to the fresh supplies from Camp Dragonhead? And stand up straight when I address you!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_020<tab>遅いぞ！　キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドからの、
補給物資はどうしたんだ！？
……なに、薪を持ってきただと？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_021<tab>Fie, I mistook you for another; I sent out a recruit some time ago to take delivery of relief supplies. You came all this way to bring more fuel? I bid you thanks.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_021<tab>おっと、すまん……人違いだった。
てっきり、食料調達に出かけた新兵だと思ってな。
わざわざ「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873A01 /var>」を届けてくれたのか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_022<tab>'Tis no comfort we seek, you understand, but life. The cold is too relentless to go long without fire. I give thanks for your service, but Coerthas is no place for those who lack discipline and faith. You will perish, and in so doing, mayhap endanger the crusade.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB610_00892_STEPHANNOT_000_022<tab>この寒さだ、暖を取らないと凍え死んでしまうからな。
今回は助かったが、このクルザスは冒険者が、
ウロウロしていいような土地ではない。覚えておくことだ。
